paper_abstract: This article proposes the use of argument principle method (APM) to find all complex resonant frequencies in a three layer cylindrical cavity. APM guarantees that no root is lost and frequencies can be associated with the resonant mode. The roots can be used to find permittivity of a material inside a cavity. (c) 2015 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 25:530-535, 2015.
paper_title: Finding resonant frequencies for high loss dielectrics in cylindrical cavities
